{"id":961809613,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â week","timestamp":1685640959,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/961809613/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int idx = 0;\n        int right_sum = 0;\n        int left_sum = 0;\n        //for (int i = 0; i <= idx; ++i) left_sum += nums[i];\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); ++i) right_sum += nums[i];\n        while (left_sum < right_sum) {\n            //cout << left_sum << \" \" << right_sum<<endl;\n            if (left_sum + nums[idx] == right_sum)\n                return idx;\n            else if (left_sum + nums[idx] < right_sum) {\n                left_sum += nums[idx];\n                right_sum -= nums[idx];\n                idx++;\n            } else \n                idx--;\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
